metadata.title: CVE-2018-11743 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: The init_copy function in kernel.c in mruby 1.4.1 makes initialize_copycalls for TT_ICLASS objects, which allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (mrb_hash_keys uninitialized pointer and application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: mruby package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
